phrases: We have not seen it once since the saucer came.
Even if we could, it is still half a month away.
Since that day seven years ago.
Please everyone, let us enter the Hokubi Festival.
Hey, are you seriously entering the Hokubi Festival?
Do not you have to get ready to study abroad?
But she is kind of a friend.
Shione, do you have plans later?
I want to discuss something with you.
It is not a big deal.
Also, I wrote Shione's name down as a participant.
Let us do it, the five of us.
Is this what you wanted to discuss?
Third years are supposed to join independently.
Now that we are all here, let us go.
She is always been like this, remember?
I think they go on your fridge.
I got dragged out here suddenly.
What do you expect me to do?
I know, it must be a pain.
You would know, would not you?
You used to be really close.
Did you get in a fight?
I used to be like that, too.
It tends to be something really stupid that sets it off.
I do not even know what we are making.
How would I know what to look for?
Oh, Komiya did all this research by herself, too.
Shione, if you do not mind, see you
You should come if you can.
You can give it to friends and family.
I missed my chance to give her one.
Things get bad when I am far from the saucer.
Nonoka, did you watch the meteor shower with Shione?
I think we will be able to.
Can Shione smile with you guys, too?
I will make you anything you want.
I am going to draw on it with the ketchup.
It is kind of shoddy looking.
You do not get it, Souta.
This prototype may not look like much,
but it took a lot of effort and spare time to make.
Is this really going to work?
We put a plastic sheet over this light bulb.
It has the Kiriyako City sky on it.
Could not we use that thing you made, Togawa?
I helped, so I am looking, too.
Come on, Yuzuki, everyone else helped, too.
If it works, let us all take turns.
I am turning on the switch.
I think it just needs more power.
No, that probably would not be...
I was the one that messed up.
So do you always have these with you?
I was hoping to eat with you guys today.
Yeah, Nonoka said we should call the saucer.
Remember we all got prepared, like we did today?
We talked about how we should do it,
and we tried all sorts of things.
It was pretty stupid in retrospect.
Did we really call that saucer?
But we are in different schools, so we can only meet here.
Yuzuki and Souta are twins, but they are really different.
We are going to watch the stars together.
We promised to watch the meteor shower.
If Shione comes, can you tell her something?
I will not be able to meet her, but I will be back.
I will come back right away.
Tell her when I do, let us watch the meteor shower together.
I was supposed to tell her myself.
I do not want to say bye.
How can you make it better?
How do you know that song?
that she is coming back right away,
so she wants to watch the meteor shower with you.
Things get bad when I am far from the saucer.
Can you get in without this?
Are not you going to watch the meteor shower with Nonoka?
Is it because I did not explain it to you properly?
It is because Nonoka's a liar.
We are going to watch the meteor shower together, right?
What did you come back for after all this time?
I am afraid of my trust being betrayed.
Nonoka came back, like she promised.
It is my fault for not being able to trust her completely.
Nonoka kept her promise, so now it is my turn to grant your wish.
Shione, let us watch the meteor shower together.
We will get a good view this year.
Now's a good time, so tell me the truth.
Do you like her or not?
I got a lot of help from everyone.
It is not quite a meteor shower,
but I could not keep my promise, so...
It is not the same as back then.
I knew that, so why did I wait?
What did you come back for, after all this time?
I would like to say it is to keep my promise to you,
but I would really forgotten about this town until I met Noel.
Even Yuzuki and Koharu and Souta.
I have been trying not to remember those times.
If it were not for Noel, I probably would not have even thought about it.
But I want to watch a meteor shower with you.
You are my precious, precious friend.
I am the one that is awful.
I could not trust my beloved friend.
I want to watch the meteor shower with you this year.
I want to be friends with you again.
A planetarium in place of a meteor shower, huh?
We will get a good view this year.
Yeah, she said she will help.
You were the same Nonoka that I knew before.
Next episode of Celestial Method : The Meaning of Goodbye.
